content:
Certainly! Here's a shorter version that is still persuasive:

"Hello [Client Name], this is Denis from Equitable, and I'm calling to schedule your annual financial review. It's important that we take the time to review your 403(b) retirement account to ensure your investment strategy is in line with your financial goals. This review is a critical step in your financial planning process, and I believe it's in your best interest to take advantage of this opportunity. What day and time works best for you?"
